Disgraced Auckland lawyer allegedly practising in Australia despite being struck off https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/disgraced-auckland-lawyer-allegedly-practising-in-australia-despite-being-struck-off/YIRMIL4LKNDFTIBWL5626255HU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/disgraced-auckland-lawyer-allegedly-practising-in-australia-despite-being-struck-off/YIRMIL4LKNDFTIBWL5626255HU/ Jaime LythDisgraced Auckland lawyer Mehal Kejriwal was struck off for swindling clients in 2017. Photo / NZME

Buyer vacuuming house before settlement, agent found guilty of unsatisfactory conduct https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/buyer-vacuuming-house-before-settlement-agent-found-guilty-of-unsatisfactory-conduct/5JPON7PB4RCCJD7FWUSZXKGESA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/buyer-vacuuming-house-before-settlement-agent-found-guilty-of-unsatisfactory-conduct/5JPON7PB4RCCJD7FWUSZXKGESA/ Anne GibsonParmar gave keys to the purchaser the day before settlement without the vendors' consent.
